00002 
00016 PSGP::PSGP(mat& X, vec& Y, CovarianceFunction& cf, int nActivePoints, int _iterChanging, int _iterFixed) 
00017 : ForwardModel(X.cols(), 1), Locations(X), Observations(Y), covFunc(cf)
00018 {
00019     assert(Locations.rows() == Observations.size());
00020 
00021     maxActiveSet = nActivePoints;
00022     epsilonTolerance = 1e-6;
00023     gammaTolerance = 1e-3;
00024     
00025     
00026     iterChanging = _iterChanging;
00027     iterFixed = _iterFixed;
00028 
00029     nObs = Locations.rows();
00030 
00031     likelihoodType = Approximate;
00032     
00033     resetPosterior();
00034     
00035     // Which version of the implementation to use. Should be using V3 
00036     // as it is the fastest, but I have left the other versions for
00037     // backward comparison/debugging, should they be needed.
00038     algoVersion = ALGO_V3;
00039 }

00049 
00055 void PSGP::setActiveSet(ivec activeIndexes, mat activeLocations) 
00056 {
00057     assert(activeIndexes.length() == activeLocations.rows());
00058     
00059     resetPosterior();
00060     
00061     // Set active indexes and locations
00062     idxActiveSet = activeIndexes;
00063     ActiveSet = activeLocations;
00064     sizeActiveSet = activeIndexes.length();
00065     
00066     // Disable replacement of active set in posterior computation
00067     iterChanging = 0;
00068 }

00070 
00074 void PSGP::computePosterior(const LikelihoodType& noiseModel)
00075 {
00076     bool fixActiveSet = false;
00077 
00078     // Cycle several times through the data, first allowing the active
00079     // set to change (for iterChanging iterations) and then fixing it
00080     // (for iterFixed iterations)
00081     for(int cycle = 1; cycle <= (iterChanging + iterFixed); cycle++)
00082     {
00083         if(cycle > iterChanging) fixActiveSet = true;
00084         
00085         // Present observations in a random order
00086         ivec randObsIndex = itppext::randperm(nObs);
00087         
00088         for(int i=0; i<nObs; i++)       
00089         {
00090             cout << "\rProcessing observation: " << i+1 << "/" << nObs  << flush;
00091             processObservationEP(randObsIndex(i), noiseModel, fixActiveSet);
00092         }
00093         cout << endl;
00094     }
00095 }

00101 void PSGP::computePosterior(const ivec& modelIndex, const Vec<LikelihoodType *> noiseModel)
00102 {
00103     // Check if we have an index and a model per observation
00104     assert(nObs == modelIndex.length()); 
00105 
00106     bool fixActiveSet = false;
00107 
00108     // Cycle several times through the data, first allowing the active
00109     // set to change (for iterChanging iterations) and then fixing it
00110     // (for iterFixed iterations)
00111     for(int cycle = 1; cycle <= (iterChanging + iterFixed); cycle++)
00112     {
00113         if(cycle > iterChanging) fixActiveSet = true;
00114 
00115         // Present observations in a random order
00116         ivec randObsIndex = itppext::randperm(nObs);
00117 
00118         for(int iObs=0; iObs<nObs; iObs++)      
00119         {
00120             int iModel = modelIndex(randObsIndex(iObs));
00121             cout << "\rProcessing observation: " << iObs+1 << "/" << nObs << flush;
00122             // cout << " using likelihood model " << iModel << flush;
00123             
00124             assert(iModel < noiseModel.length() && iModel >= 0);
00125             
00126             processObservationEP(randObsIndex(iObs), *noiseModel(iModel), fixActiveSet);
00127         }
00128         cout << endl;
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00143 void PSGP::processObservationEP(const int iObs, const LikelihoodType &noiseModel, const bool fixActiveSet) 
00144 {
00145     double sigmaLoc;                // Auto-covariance of location
00146     vec k = zeros(sizeActiveSet);   // Covariance between location and active set
00147     
00148     double r, q;                    // Online coefficients
00149     double cavityMean, cavityVar;   // Cavity mean and variance
00150     double gamma;                   // Mean of ??
00151     vec    eHat;                    // Variance of ??
00152     
00153     // Retrieve location and observation at index iObs
00154     vec loc    = Locations.get_row(iObs);
00155     double obs = Observations(iObs);
00156     
00157     // Remove previous contribution of observation iObs
00158     // Appendix G.(a)
00159     EP_removePreviousContribution(iObs);
00160     
00161     // Intermediate computations: covariances, cavity mean and variance
00162     // Appendix G.(c)
00163     EP_updateIntermediateComputations(cavityMean, cavityVar, sigmaLoc, k, gamma, eHat, loc);
00164     
00165     // Compute the updated q and r online coefficients for the specified 
00166     // likelihood model, using the updated alpha and C.
00167     // Appendix G.(b), Sec. 2.4, Eq. 2.42, 3.28
00168     double logEvidence = noiseModel.updateCoefficients(q, r, obs, cavityMean, cavityVar);
00169     
00170     // stabiliseCoefficients(q, r, cavityMean, cavityVar, 1e3, 1e-6);
00171     
00172     // Update EP parameters
00173     EP_updateEPParameters(iObs, q, r,  cavityMean, cavityVar, logEvidence);
00174             
00175     // Perform full or sparse update depending on geometry (gamma)
00176     // Appendix G.(e)
00177     if (gamma >= gammaTolerance*sigmaLoc && !fixActiveSet)
00178     {
00179         //----------------------------------------------
00180         // Full update
00181         //----------------------------------------------
00182         cout << " (full update)";
00183         
00184         if (sizeActiveSet < maxActiveSet)
00185         {
00186             // Add observation to active set and update parameters 
00187             addActivePoint(iObs, q, r, k, sigmaLoc, gamma, eHat);
00188         }
00189         else
00190         {
00191             switch(algoVersion) {
00192             
00193             case ALGO_V1:
00194             {
00195                 // Add observation to active set
00196                 addActivePoint(iObs, q, r, k, sigmaLoc, gamma, eHat);
00197 
00198                 // Compute scores for each active point
00199                 vec scores = scoreActivePoints(FullKL);
00200 
00201                 // Remove active point with lowest score, and update alpha, C, Q and P
00202                 int swapCandidate = min_index(scores);
00203                 deleteActivePoint(swapCandidate);
00204                 break;
00205             }
00206             case ALGO_V2:
00207                 // Swap observation with one existing active point if
00208                 // the swap results in an improved active set
00209                 addActivePointAugmented_v1(iObs, q, r, k, sigmaLoc, gamma, eHat);
00210                 break;
00211                 
00212             default: // This also covers the case ALGO_V3
00213                 // Swap observation with one existing active point if
00214                 // the swap results in an improved active set
00215                 addActivePointAugmented_v2(iObs, q, r, k, sigmaLoc, gamma, eHat);
00216             }
00217         }
00218         
00219     }
00220     else
00221     {
00222         //----------------------------------------------
00223         // Sparse update
00224         //----------------------------------------------
00225         P.set_row(iObs, eHat);
00226         
00227         vec s;
00228         if (sizeActiveSet>0) s = C*k;
00229         s += eHat;
00230         
00231         // Update GP parameters - same as full update case, but with scaling
00232         // Appendix G.(f)
00233         double eta = 1.0 / (1.0 + gamma*r);  // Scaling factor
00234         alpha += eta * s * q;
00235         C     += r * eta * outer_product(s, s, false);
00236     }
00237     
00238     
00239     // Remove unneeded active points based on geometry
00240     EP_removeCollapsedPoints();
00241 }
00242 
00243 
00249 void PSGP::EP_removePreviousContribution(int iObs) 
00250 {
00251     if (varEP(iObs) > LAMBDA_TOLERANCE)   
00252     {
00253         vec p = P.get_row(iObs);
00254         vec Kp = KB * p;
00255 
00256         // Update alpha and C
00257         vec h  = C * Kp + p;
00258         double nu = varEP(iObs) / ( 1.0 - varEP(iObs) * dot(Kp,h) );
00259         alpha += h * nu * ( dot(alpha, Kp) - meanEP(iObs) );
00260         C += nu * outer_product(h,h);
00261     }
00262 }
00263 
00264 
00270 void PSGP::EP_updateIntermediateComputations(double &cavityMean, double &cavityVar, double &sigmaLoc,
00271                                               vec &k, double &gamma, vec &eHat, vec loc) 
00272 {
00273     assert(k.length() == sizeActiveSet);
00274     
00275     covFunc.covariance(sigmaLoc, loc);           // Auto-variance of location
00276     
00277     if(sizeActiveSet == 0)
00278     {
00279         cavityVar = sigmaLoc;
00280         cavityMean = 0.0;
00281         eHat = zeros(0);
00282         gamma = sigmaLoc;
00283     } 
00284     else 
00285     {
00286         covFunc.covariance(sigmaLoc, loc);           // Auto-variance of location
00287         covFunc.covariance(k, ActiveSet, loc);      // cov(location, active set)
00288         cavityVar = sigmaLoc + dot(k, C * k);
00289         cavityMean = dot(k, alpha);
00290         
00291         // This way of computing eHat is more robust - but much more 
00292         // computationaly expensive, as we already store Q = inv(KB)
00293         // eHat = backslash(KB, k);
00294         eHat = Q*k;
00295         gamma = sigmaLoc - dot(k, eHat);
00296     }
00297 }
00298 
00299 
00303 void PSGP::EP_updateEPParameters(int iObs, double q, double r, double cavityMean, double cavityVar, 
00304                                  double logEvidence)
00305 {
00306     double ratio = q / r;
00307     logZ(iObs)= logEvidence + (log(2.0 * pi) - log(abs(r)) - (q * ratio)) / 2.0;
00308     meanEP(iObs) = cavityMean - ratio;
00309     varEP(iObs) = -r / (1.0 + (r * cavityVar));
00310 }
00311 
00312 
00316 void PSGP::addActivePoint(int iObs, double q, double r, vec k, double sigmaLoc, double gamma, vec eHat)
00317 {
00318     vec s;
00319     if (sizeActiveSet>0) s = C*k;
00320     
00321     // Increase size of active set
00322     sizeActiveSet++; 
00323    
00324     // Append index of observation to indexes in active set
00325     idxActiveSet.set_size(sizeActiveSet, true);
00326     idxActiveSet(sizeActiveSet - 1) = iObs;
00327     
00328     // Increase storage size for active set and store new observation
00329     // ActiveSet.set_size(sizeActiveSet, Locations.cols(), true);
00330     // ActiveSet.set_row(sizeActiveSet - 1, Locations.get_row(iObs));
00331     ActiveSet.append_row(Locations.get_row(iObs));
00332 
00333     // Increase size of C and alpha
00334     alpha.set_size(sizeActiveSet, true);
00335     C.set_size(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet, true);
00336     
00337     // e is the unit vector for dimension sizeActiveSet
00338     vec e = zeros(nObs);
00339     e(iObs) = 1.0;
00340     
00341     // Update P matrix
00342     P.append_col(e);
00343     
00344     // Update KB matrix - add auto and cross covariances
00345     KB.append_col(k);
00346     KB.append_row( concat(k, sigmaLoc) );
00347     
00348     // update Q = inv(KB) matrix
00349     eHat.set_size(sizeActiveSet, true);
00350     eHat(sizeActiveSet - 1) = -1.0;
00351     Q.set_size(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet, true);
00352     Q += outer_product(eHat, eHat) / gamma;
00353     
00354     // Update GP parameters
00355     // Appendix G.(f)
00356     s.set_size(sizeActiveSet, true);     // Increase size of s and append 1.0
00357     s(sizeActiveSet-1) = 1.0; 
00358     
00359     alpha += s * q;
00360     C     += r * outer_product(s, s, false);
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00373 void PSGP::addActivePointAugmented_v1(int iObs, double q, double r, vec k, double sigmaLoc, double gamma, vec eHat)
00374 {
00375     assert(sizeActiveSet == maxActiveSet);
00376     
00377     // Initialise augmented matrices
00378     vec z = zeros(maxActiveSet+1);
00379 
00380     idxActiveSet_aug = concat(idxActiveSet, iObs);
00381     alpha_aug = concat(alpha, 0.0);
00382     
00383     ActiveSet_aug.set_submatrix(0, 0, ActiveSet);
00384     P_aug.set_submatrix(0, 0, P);
00385     Q_aug.set_submatrix(0, 0, Q);
00386     C_aug.set_submatrix(0, 0, C);
00387     KB_aug.set_submatrix(0, 0, KB);
00388     
00389     Q_aug.set_row(maxActiveSet, z);
00390     Q_aug.set_col(maxActiveSet, z);
00391     C_aug.set_row(maxActiveSet, z);
00392     C_aug.set_col(maxActiveSet, z);
00393             
00394     // Add current observation to augmented active set
00395     ActiveSet_aug.set_row(maxActiveSet, Locations.get_row(iObs));
00396     
00397     // e is the unit vector for dimension sizeActiveSet
00398     vec e = zeros(nObs);
00399     e(iObs) = 1.0;
00400     P_aug.set_col(maxActiveSet, e);
00401     
00402     // Update KB matrix - add auto and cross covariances
00403     vec newk = concat(k, sigmaLoc);
00404     KB_aug.set_col(maxActiveSet, newk);
00405     KB_aug.set_row(maxActiveSet, newk);
00406     
00407     // update Q = inv(KB) matrix
00408     vec eHat_aug = concat(eHat, -1.0);
00409     Q_aug += outer_product(eHat_aug, eHat_aug) / gamma;
00410     
00411     // Update GP parameters
00412     // Appendix G.(f)
00413     vec s = concat(C*k, 1.0);
00414     
00415     alpha_aug += s * q;
00416     C_aug     += r * outer_product(s, s, false);
00417     
00418     // Determine which point in the extended active set we need to remove
00419     // to get back to the maximum size. If this point is not the point we
00420     // we just added, swap it with the current observation.
00421     
00422     // Compute scores for each active point
00423     vec scores = scoreActivePoints(FullKL);
00424     
00425     // Remove active point with lowest score, and update alpha, C, Q and P
00426     int swapCandidate = min_index(scores);
00427     swapActivePoint_v1(swapCandidate);
00428 }
00429 
00430 
00444 void PSGP::addActivePointAugmented_v2(int iObs, double q, double r, vec k, double sigmaLoc, double gamma, vec eHat)
00445 {
00446     assert(sizeActiveSet == maxActiveSet);
00447     
00448     ActiveSet_new = Locations.get_row(iObs);
00449     idxActiveSet_new = iObs;
00450     
00451     P_new = zeros(nObs);
00452     P_new(iObs) = 1.0;
00453     
00454     alpha_new = q;
00455     
00456     vec s = C*k;
00457     C_new = r*s;
00458     c_new = r;
00459 
00460     Q_new = -eHat/gamma;
00461     q_new = 1.0/gamma;
00462     
00463     KB_new = k;
00464     kb_new = sigmaLoc;
00465 
00466     // Update parameters for current active set
00467     alpha += q*s;
00468     C     += r*outer_product(s,s,false);
00469     Q     += outer_product(eHat,eHat)/gamma;
00470     
00471 
00472     // Determine which point in the extended active set we need to remove
00473     // to get back to the maximum size. If this point is not the point we
00474     // we just added, swap it with the current observation.
00475 
00476     // Compute scores for each active point
00477     vec scores = scoreActivePoints(FullKL);
00478 
00479     // Remove active point with lowest score, and update alpha, C, Q and P
00480     int swapCandidate = min_index(scores);
00481     swapActivePoint_v2(swapCandidate);    
00482 }
00483 
00484 
00491 void PSGP::deleteActivePoint(int iObs)
00492 {
00493     // Elements for iObs (correspond to the * superscripts in Csato)
00494     double alpha_i = alpha(iObs);
00495     double c_i     = C(iObs, iObs);
00496     double q_i     = Q(iObs, iObs);
00497     vec    P_i     = P.get_col(iObs);
00498 
00499     // Covariance between iObs and other active points
00500     vec    C_i     = C.get_row(iObs);
00501     vec    Q_i     = Q.get_row(iObs);
00502     C_i.del(iObs);  // Delete cov(iObs, iObs), we only 
00503     Q_i.del(iObs);  // want the cross terms
00504     
00505     // Updated elements without iObs (correspond to the "r" superscripts in Csato)
00506     alpha.del(iObs);
00507     C.del_col(iObs);
00508     C.del_row(iObs);
00509     Q.del_col(iObs);
00510     Q.del_row(iObs);
00511     P.del_col(iObs);
00512 
00513     // Update new (reduced) elements
00514     alpha -= ( alpha_i / (c_i + q_i) ) * (Q_i + C_i);    // Eq. 3.19
00515     mat QQq = outer_product( Q_i, Q_i ) / q_i;
00516     C += QQq - outer_product( Q_i+C_i, Q_i+C_i ) / ( q_i+c_i );
00517     Q -= QQq;
00518     P -= outer_product( P_i, Q_i) / q_i;
00519     
00520     // Update Gram matrix
00521     KB.del_row(iObs);
00522     KB.del_col(iObs);
00523     
00524     // Update active set
00525     ActiveSet.del_row(iObs);
00526     idxActiveSet.del(iObs);
00527     sizeActiveSet--;
00528 }
00529 
00530 
00535 void PSGP::swapActivePoint_v1(int iDel)
00536 {
00537     // Swap iObs with last active point in augmented matrices
00538     int iObs = maxActiveSet;
00539     
00540     if (iDel != maxActiveSet) 
00541     { 
00542         C_aug.swap_cols(iObs, iDel);
00543         C_aug.swap_rows(iObs, iDel);
00544         Q_aug.swap_cols(iObs, iDel);
00545         Q_aug.swap_rows(iObs, iDel);
00546         KB_aug.swap_cols(iObs, iDel);
00547         KB_aug.swap_rows(iObs, iDel);
00548         P_aug.swap_cols(iObs, iDel);
00549         double alpha_last = alpha_aug(iObs);
00550         alpha_aug(iObs) = alpha_aug(iDel);
00551         alpha_aug(iDel) = alpha_last;
00552         P.set_col(iDel, P_aug.get_col(iDel));
00553         
00554         // Update Gram matrix
00555         vec k_add = KB_aug.get_col(iDel);
00556         k_add.del(iObs);
00557         
00558         KB.set_col(iDel, k_add);
00559         KB.set_row(iDel, k_add);
00560         
00561         // Update active set
00562         ActiveSet.set_row(iDel, ActiveSet_aug.get_row(maxActiveSet));
00563         idxActiveSet(iDel) = idxActiveSet_aug(maxActiveSet);
00564     }
00565     
00566     alpha = alpha_aug(0,iObs-1);
00567     C = C_aug(0, iObs-1, 0, iObs-1);
00568     Q = Q_aug(0, iObs-1, 0, iObs-1);
00569         
00570     // Elements for point to be deleted (correspond to the * superscripts in Csato)
00571     double alpha_i = alpha_aug(iObs);
00572     
00573     double c_i     = C_aug(iObs, iObs);
00574     double q_i     = Q_aug(iObs, iObs);
00575     vec    P_i     = P_aug.get_col(iObs);
00576     
00577     // Covariance between element to be removed and other active points
00578     vec    C_i     = C_aug.get_row(iObs);
00579     vec    Q_i     = Q_aug.get_row(iObs);
00580     C_i.del(iObs);  // Delete cov(iObs, iObs), we only 
00581     Q_i.del(iObs);  // want the cross terms
00582     
00583     // Update new (reduced) elements
00584     alpha -= ( alpha_i / (c_i + q_i) ) * (Q_i + C_i);    // Eq. 3.19
00585     mat QQq = outer_product( Q_i, Q_i ) / q_i;
00586     C += QQq - outer_product( Q_i+C_i, Q_i+C_i ) / ( q_i+c_i );
00587     Q -= QQq;
00588     P -= outer_product( P_i, Q_i) / q_i;    
00589 }
00590 
00600 void PSGP::swapActivePoint_v2(int iDel)
00601 {
00602     double alpha_i, c_i, q_i;
00603     vec P_i, C_i, Q_i;
00604  
00605     assert(sizeActiveSet == maxActiveSet);
00606     
00607     if (iDel == maxActiveSet) 
00608     {
00609         alpha_i = alpha_new;
00610         q_i = q_new;
00611         c_i = c_new;
00612 
00613         P_i = P_new;
00614         Q_i = Q_new;
00615         C_i = C_new;
00616     }
00617     else
00618     {
00619         // Elements for point to be deleted (correspond to the * superscripts in Csato)
00620         alpha_i = alpha(iDel);
00621         c_i     = C(iDel, iDel);
00622         q_i     = Q(iDel, iDel);
00623         P_i     = P.get_col(iDel);
00624     
00625         // Covariance between element to be removed and other active points
00626         C_i     = C.get_row(iDel);
00627         Q_i     = Q.get_row(iDel);
00628     
00629         C_i(iDel) = C_new(iDel);   // Replace cov(iDel, iDel) with  
00630         Q_i(iDel) = Q_new(iDel);   // cov(iDel, new point)
00631     
00632         C_new(iDel) = c_new;       // cov(iDel, new point) is now
00633         Q_new(iDel) = q_new;       // cov(new point, new point)
00634     
00635 
00636         // Swap point to be removed with new point 
00637         alpha(iDel) = alpha_new;
00638                 
00639         C.set_col(iDel, C_new);
00640         C.set_row(iDel, C_new);
00641         
00642         Q.set_col(iDel, Q_new);
00643         Q.set_row(iDel, Q_new);
00644         
00645         P.set_col(iDel, P_new);
00646         
00647         // Update Gram matrix
00648         KB_new(iDel) = kb_new;
00649         KB.set_col(iDel, KB_new);
00650         KB.set_row(iDel, KB_new);
00651         
00652         // Update active set
00653         ActiveSet.set_row(iDel, ActiveSet_new);
00654         idxActiveSet(iDel) = idxActiveSet_new;
00655     }
00656     
00657         
00658     // Update new (reduced) elements
00659     alpha -= ( alpha_i / (c_i + q_i) ) * (Q_i + C_i);    // Eq. 3.19
00660     mat QQq = outer_product( Q_i, Q_i ) / q_i;
00661     C += QQq - outer_product( Q_i+C_i, Q_i+C_i ) / ( q_i+c_i );
00662     Q -= QQq;
00663     P -= outer_product( P_i, Q_i) / q_i;
00664 }
00665 
00666 
00671 void PSGP::EP_removeCollapsedPoints()
00672 {
00673     while(sizeActiveSet > 0)
00674     {
00675         vec scores = scoreActivePoints(Geometric);
00676         int removalCandidate = min_index(scores);
00677         
00678         if(scores(removalCandidate) >= (gammaTolerance / 1000.0))
00679         {
00680             break;
00681         }
00682         deleteActivePoint(removalCandidate);
00683     }    
00684 }
00685 
00686 
00690 vec PSGP::scoreActivePoints(ScoringMethod sm)
00691 {
00692     vec diagC, diagS, term1, term2, term3;
00693     vec diagInvGram, a;
00694 
00695     // Extract relevant part from either augmented matrices or original ones
00696     switch (algoVersion) 
00697     {
00698     case ALGO_V1:
00699         a = alpha;
00700         diagC = diag(C);
00701         diagInvGram = diag(Q);
00702         break;
00703         
00704     case ALGO_V2:
00705         diagInvGram = diag(Q_aug);
00706         a = alpha_aug;
00707         diagC = diag(C_aug);
00708         break;
00709         
00710     default:   // This also covers the case ALGO_V3
00711         a = concat(alpha, alpha_new);
00712         diagC = concat(diag(C), c_new);
00713         diagInvGram = concat(diag(Q), q_new);
00714     }
00715     
00716     
00717     switch(sm)
00718     {
00719     case Geometric: 
00720         return(1.0 / diagInvGram);
00721 
00722     case MeanComponent : 
00723         return(elem_div(elem_mult(a,a), diagC + diagInvGram));
00724 
00725     case FullKL : // Lehel: Eq. 3.23 
00726     {
00727         switch (algoVersion) 
00728         {
00729         case ALGO_V1:
00730             // diagS = diag((P.transpose() * diag(varEP)) * P);
00731             diagS = zeros(P.cols());
00732             for (int i=0; i<P.cols(); i++) {
00733                 diagS(i) = elem_mult_sum(varEP, elem_mult(P.get_col(i),P.get_col(i)));
00734             }
00735             break;
00736 
00737         case ALGO_V2:
00738             diagS = zeros(P_aug.cols());
00739             for (int i=0; i<P_aug.cols(); i++) {
00740                 diagS(i) = elem_mult_sum(varEP, elem_mult(P_aug.get_col(i),P_aug.get_col(i)));
00741             }
00742             break;
00743 
00744         default:   // This also covers the case ALGO_V3
00745             diagS = zeros(P.cols()+1);
00746             for (int i=0; i<P.cols(); i++) {
00747                 diagS(i) = elem_mult_sum(varEP, elem_mult(P.get_col(i),P.get_col(i)));
00748             } 
00749             diagS(P.cols()) = elem_mult_sum(varEP, elem_mult(P_new,P_new));
00750         }
00751 
00752         term1 = elem_div(elem_mult(a,a), diagC + diagInvGram);
00753         term2 = elem_div(diagS, diagInvGram);
00754         term3 = log(1.0 + elem_div(diagC, diagInvGram));
00755         return (term1 + term2 + term3);
00756     }
00757     
00758     default : 
00759         cerr << "Unknown scoring method" << endl;
00760         break;
00761     }
00762 
00763     return zeros(diagInvGram.length());
00764 }
00765 
00766 
00770 void PSGP::stabiliseCoefficients(double& q, double& r, double cavityMean, double cavityVar, double upperTolerance, double lowerTolerance)
00771 {
00772     double sqrtPt = sqrt(cavityVar);
00773     double tu = -sqrtPt * r * sqrtPt; 
00774     bool mod = false;
00775     if(tu > upperTolerance)
00776     {
00777         tu = upperTolerance;
00778         cout << "Shrinking lambda" << endl;
00779         mod = true;
00780     }
00781 
00782     if(tu < lowerTolerance)
00783     {
00784         tu = lowerTolerance;
00785         cout << "(REV) Shrinking lambda" << endl;
00786         mod = true;
00787     }
00788 
00789     if(mod) {
00790         r = - (tu / sqrtPt) / tu;
00791         r = r + itpp::eps;
00792         r = r + r;
00793     }
00794 }
00795 
00796 
00800 void PSGP::makePredictions(vec& Mean, vec& Variance, const mat& Xpred, CovarianceFunction& cf) const
00801 {
00802     assert(Mean.length() == Variance.length());
00803     assert(Xpred.rows() == Mean.length());
00804 
00805     // Predictive mean
00806     mat ktest(Xpred.rows(), sizeActiveSet); 
00807     cf.covariance(ktest, Xpred, ActiveSet);
00808     Mean = ktest*alpha;
00809     
00810     // Predictive variance
00811     vec kstar(Xpred.rows());
00812     cf.computeDiagonal(kstar, Xpred);
00813     Variance = kstar + sum(elem_mult((ktest * C), ktest), 2);
00814 }
00815 
00816 
00821 void PSGP::makePredictions(vec& Mean, vec& Variance, const mat& Xpred) const
00822 {
00823     makePredictions(Mean, Variance, Xpred, covFunc);
00824 }
00825 
00826 
00830 vec PSGP::simulate(const mat& Xpred, bool approx) const
00831 {
00832     mat cov, vCov, kxbv(Xpred.rows(), sizeActiveSet);
00833     vec dCov, samp;
00834 
00835     covFunc.covariance(kxbv, Xpred, ActiveSet);
00836 
00837     if(approx)
00838     {
00839         cov = Q + C;
00840         vCov.set_size(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
00841         dCov.set_size(sizeActiveSet);
00842         eig_sym(cov, dCov, vCov);
00843         vCov = kxbv * vCov;
00844         samp = randn(sizeActiveSet);
00845     }
00846     else
00847     {
00848         mat kxx(Xpred.rows(), Xpred.rows());
00849         covFunc.covariance(kxx, Xpred);
00850         cov = kxx + ((kxbv * C) * kxbv.transpose());
00851         eig_sym(cov, dCov, vCov);
00852         samp = randn(Xpred.rows());
00853     }
00854 
00855     dCov = sqrt(abs(dCov));
00856 
00857     vec a1 = kxbv * alpha;
00858     mat a2 = vCov * diag(dCov);
00859 
00860     return(a1 + (a2 * samp));
00861 }
00862

00867 vec PSGP::getTransformedParameters() const
00868 {
00869     return covFunc.getTransformedParameters();
00870 }

00876 void PSGP::setTransformedParameters(const vec p)
00877 {
00878     covFunc.setTransformedParameters(p);
00879 }
00880 
00881 
00885 void PSGP::recomputePosterior()
00886 {
00887     cout << "Update posterior for new parameters" << endl;
00888     mat KBold = KB;
00889     mat Kplus(Observations.length(), sizeActiveSet);
00890     covFunc.covariance(KB, ActiveSet);
00891     covFunc.covariance(Kplus, Locations, ActiveSet);
00892     
00893     // RB: P should be transpose(inv(KB)*Kplus), not inv(KB)*Kplus (size is wrong otherwise)   
00894     mat Ptrans(P.cols(), P.rows());
00895     backslash(KB, Kplus.transpose(), Ptrans); // output is rightmost parameter
00896     P = Ptrans.transpose();
00897 
00898     mat varEPdiag = diag(varEP);
00899     mat projLam = P.transpose() * varEPdiag;
00900     mat UU = projLam * P;
00901     mat CC = UU * KB + eye(sizeActiveSet);
00902     alpha = backslash(CC, projLam * meanEP);
00903     C = -backslash(CC, UU);
00904     Q = computeInverseFromCholesky(KB);
00905 }
00906 
00910 void PSGP::resetPosterior()
00911 {
00912     KB.set_size(0, 0);
00913     Q.set_size(0, 0);
00914     C.set_size(0, 0);
00915     alpha.set_size(0);
00916     ActiveSet.set_size(0, getInputDimensions());
00917     idxActiveSet.set_size(0);
00918     sizeActiveSet = 0;
00919     P = zeros(Observations.length(), 0);
00920     
00921     KB_aug = zeros(maxActiveSet+1, maxActiveSet+1);
00922     Q_aug = zeros(maxActiveSet+1, maxActiveSet+1);
00923     C_aug = zeros(maxActiveSet+1, maxActiveSet+1);
00924     alpha_aug = zeros(maxActiveSet+1);
00925     ActiveSet_aug = zeros(maxActiveSet+1, getInputDimensions());
00926     idxActiveSet_aug = to_ivec(zeros(maxActiveSet+1));
00927     P_aug = zeros(Observations.length(), maxActiveSet+1);
00928 
00929     alpha_new = 0.0;
00930     kb_new = 0.0;
00931     c_new = 0.0;
00932     q_new = 0.0;
00933     idxActiveSet_new = -1;
00934     ActiveSet_new = zeros(getInputDimensions());
00935     C_new = zeros(maxActiveSet-1);
00936     KB_new = zeros(maxActiveSet-1);
00937     Q_new = zeros(maxActiveSet-1);
00938     P_new = zeros(Observations.length());
00939 
00940 
00941     varEP = zeros(Observations.length());
00942     meanEP = zeros(Observations.length());
00943     logZ = zeros(Observations.length());
00944     
00945 }
00946 
00955 double PSGP::objective() const
00956 {
00957     double evidence;
00958 
00959     switch(likelihoodType)
00960     {
00961     case FullEvid : 
00962         evidence = compEvidence();
00963         break;
00964     
00965     
00966     case Approximate : 
00967         evidence = compEvidenceApproximate();
00968         break;
00969     
00970     case UpperBound :   
00971         evidence = compEvidenceUpperBound();
00972         break;
00973         
00974     default:    
00975         // RB: This really ought to throw an exception
00976         cerr << "Error in PSGP::objective: Unknown likelihood type." << endl;
00977         return 0.0;
00978     }
00979     return evidence;
00980 }
00981 
00991 vec PSGP::gradient() const
00992 {
00993     vec g;
00994 
00995     switch(likelihoodType)
00996     {
00997     case FullEvid : 
00998         g = gradientEvidence();
00999         break;
01000         
01001     case Approximate : 
01002         g = gradientEvidenceApproximate();
01003         break;
01004         
01005     case UpperBound :   
01006         g = gradientEvidenceUpperBound();
01007         break;
01008         
01009     default : 
01010         // RB: This really ought to throw an exception
01011         g.set_size(covFunc.getNumberParameters());
01012     }
01013 
01014     return g;
01015 }
01016 
01020 double PSGP::compEvidence() const
01021 {
01022 
01023     cvec es;
01024     mat KB_new(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01025 
01026     covFunc.covariance(KB_new, ActiveSet);
01027 
01028     double evid = sum(log(varEP));
01029 
01030     evid -= sum(elem_mult(pow(meanEP, 2.0), varEP));
01031     evid += 2.0 * sum(logZ);
01032     evid -= varEP.length() * log(2.0 * pi);
01033     mat Klp = P.transpose() * diag(varEP);
01034     mat Ksm = (Klp * P) * KB_new + eye(sizeActiveSet);
01035     vec Kall = Klp * meanEP;    
01036     mat Kinv= backslash(Ksm.transpose(), KB_new.transpose());
01037 
01038     evid += dot(Kall, Kinv.transpose() * Kall);
01039 
01040     if(eig(Ksm, es))
01041     {
01042         evid -= sum(log(real(es)));
01043     }
01044     else
01045     {
01046         cerr << "Problem computing evidence: eig_sum()" << endl;
01047     }
01048 
01049     return -evid / 2.0;
01050 }
01051 
01052 
01056 double PSGP::compEvidenceApproximate() const
01057 {
01058     mat cholSigma(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01059     mat Sigma(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01060     
01061     covFunc.covariance(Sigma, ActiveSet);
01062     mat invSigma = computeInverseFromCholesky(Sigma);
01063     vec obsActiveSet = Observations(idxActiveSet);
01064     
01065     vec alpha = invSigma * obsActiveSet;
01066 
01067     double like1 = sum(log(diag(chol(Sigma))));
01068     double like2 = 0.5 * dot(obsActiveSet, alpha);
01069 
01070     return like1 + like2 + 0.5 * sizeActiveSet * log(2 * pi);
01071 }
01072 
01073 
01077 double PSGP::compEvidenceUpperBound() const
01078 {
01079     mat KB_new(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01080     covFunc.covariance(KB_new, ActiveSet);
01081 
01082     mat U(KB_new.rows(), KB_new.cols());
01083     if (!chol(KB_new, U)) { 
01084         cout << "** Error in Cholesky decomposition of KB_new" << endl;
01085         cout << "Current covariance function parameters:" << endl;
01086         covFunc.displayCovarianceParameters();
01087         cout << "** Try using the Approximate evidence instead of the UpperBound" << endl;
01088         cout << "Press a key to abort" << endl;
01089         getchar();
01090         exit(1);
01091     }
01092     
01093     double like1 = 2.0 * (sum(log(diag(U))));
01094     // double like2 = trace((eye(sizeActiveSet) + 
01095     //         (KB * (C + outer_product(alpha, alpha)))) * backslash(KB_new, KB));
01096     double like2 = trace( ( eye(sizeActiveSet) + 
01097                             KB * (C + outer_product(alpha, alpha))
01098                           ) * backslash(U,backslash(U.transpose(), KB)) 
01099                         );
01100     
01101     return 0.5*(like1 + like2 + sizeActiveSet * log(2 * pi));
01102 }
01103 
01104 
01108 vec PSGP::gradientEvidence() const
01109 {
01110     vec grads = zeros(covFunc.getNumberParameters());
01111     return grads;
01112 
01113 }
01114 
01115 
01119 vec PSGP::gradientEvidenceApproximate() const
01120 {
01121     vec grads(covFunc.getNumberParameters());
01122 
01123     mat cholSigma(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01124     mat Sigma(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01125 
01126     covFunc.covariance(Sigma, ActiveSet);
01127     cholSigma = computeCholesky(Sigma);
01128     mat invSigma = computeInverseFromCholesky(Sigma);
01129     // chol(Sigma, cholSigma);
01130     // mat invSigma = backslash( cholSigma, eye(sizeActiveSet) );
01131     // invSigma *= invSigma.transpose();
01132     
01133     vec obsActiveSet = Observations(idxActiveSet);
01134     vec alpha = invSigma * obsActiveSet;
01135 
01136     mat W = (invSigma - outer_product(alpha, alpha, false));
01137 
01138     mat partialDeriv(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01139 
01140     for(int i = 0; i < covFunc.getNumberParameters(); i++)
01141     {
01142         covFunc.covarianceGradient(partialDeriv, i, ActiveSet);
01143         grads(i) = elem_mult_sum(W, partialDeriv) / 2.0;
01144     }
01145     return grads; 
01146 }
01147 
01148 
01152 vec PSGP::gradientEvidenceUpperBound() const
01153 {
01154 
01155     vec grads(covFunc.getNumberParameters());
01156 
01157     mat W = eye(sizeActiveSet);
01158     mat KB_new(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01159     covFunc.covariance(KB_new, ActiveSet);
01160 
01161     // RB: This gives the correct gradient for the length scale
01162     mat partialDeriv(sizeActiveSet, sizeActiveSet);
01163     mat U = backslash(KB_new,KB);
01164 
01165     W +=  KB * (C + outer_product(alpha, alpha));
01166 
01167     for(int i = 0; i < covFunc.getNumberParameters(); i++)
01168     {
01169         covFunc.covarianceGradient(partialDeriv, i, ActiveSet);
01170         mat V1 = backslash(KB_new,partialDeriv);
01171         mat V2 = W*backslash(KB_new,partialDeriv*U);
01172 
01173         grads(i) = trace(V1-V2);
01174     }
01175 
01176     return 0.5*grads;
01177 }

01184 {
01185     likelihoodType = lc;
01186 }

01192 void PSGP::displayModelParameters() const
01193 {
01194     cout << "Summary Sequential Gaussian Process" << endl;
01195     cout << "  Kernel Matrix size         : " << KB.rows() << " x " << KB.cols() << endl;
01196     cout << "  Inverse Kernel Matrix size : " << Q.rows() << " x " << Q.cols() << endl;
01197     cout << "  alpha size                 : " << alpha.size() << endl;
01198     cout << "  C size                     : " << C.rows() << " x " << C.cols() << endl;
01199     cout << "  Projection matrix size     : " << P.rows() << " x " << P.cols() << endl;
01200     cout << "  Lambda                     : " << varEP.size() << endl;
01201     cout << "  projection alpha           : " << meanEP.size() << endl;
01202     cout << "  log evidence vector        : " << logZ.size() << endl;
01203     cout << "  ----------------------------" << endl;
01204     cout << "  Predicion locations        : " << Locations.rows() << " x " << Locations.cols() << endl;
01205     cout << "  Observations               : " << Observations.size() << endl;
01206     cout << "  Active set size            : " << ActiveSet.rows() << " (max = " << maxActiveSet << ")" << endl;
01207     cout << "  Epsilon tolerance          : " << epsilonTolerance << endl;
01208     cout << "  Iterations Changing/Fixed  : " << iterChanging << "/" << iterFixed << endl;
01209 }
01210 
01211 
01218 mat PSGP::computeCholesky(const mat& iM) const 
01219 {
01220     mat M = iM;
01221     assert(M.rows() == M.cols());
01222 
01223     const double ampl = 1.0e-10;
01224     const int maxAttempts = 10;
01225 
01226     mat cholFactor(M.rows(), M.cols());
01227 
01228     int l = 0;
01229     bool success = chol(M, cholFactor);
01230     if(success)
01231     {
01232         return cholFactor;
01233     }
01234     else
01235     {
01236         double noiseFactor = abs(ampl * (trace(M) / double(M.rows())));
01237         while(!success)
01238         {
01239             M = M + (noiseFactor * eye(M.rows()));
01240 
01241             if(l > maxAttempts)
01242             {
01243                 cerr << "Unable to compute cholesky decomposition" << endl;
01244                 break;
01245             }
01246             l++;
01247             noiseFactor = noiseFactor * 10;
01248             success = chol(M, cholFactor);
01249         }
01250         cout << "Matrix not positive definite.  After " << l << " attempts, " << noiseFactor << " added to the diagonal" << endl;
01251     }
01252     return cholFactor;
01253 
01254 }
01255 
01256 
01262 mat PSGP::computeInverseFromCholesky(const mat& C) const
01263 {
01264     mat cholFactor = computeCholesky(C);
01265     mat invChol = backslash(cholFactor, eye(cholFactor.rows()));
01266     return invChol * invChol.transpose();
01267 }
